channel.title: Tools on Sundar
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Sundar

item.title: Tools that make me productive - Web Development
item.description: Just wanted to share and list down the tools that I use for my projects (web-development in particular). VS Code I have become a super fan of VS-Code, so so light weight and it has become the defacto Editor for any JS projects - frontend as well as backend. I use it for few of my python projects as well it works as a Charm (infact better than PyCharm.. :)
